metaTitle: ATAMARIA PARADISE Moratalla | 3 Bed Villas from €289,000
metaDescription: Discover ATAMARIA PARADISE in Moratalla, Murcia. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €289,000. Trusted developer PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. Delivery 2028. View details.

content.heroIntro: ATAMARIA PARADISE represents a unique opportunity to own a stunning modern villa in the heart of Moratalla, Murcia, developed by the trusted and reputable PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. This exclusive residential development showcases contemporary architecture and premium finishes, offering 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas on spacious 750m² plots, starting from just €289,000. Located in the picturesque Campo de San Juan area, ATAMARIA PARADISE combines the tranquility of rural Murcia with exceptional proximity to world-class amenities. Residents enjoy direct access to multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses, comprehensive healthcare facilities, and a thriving international community where English is widely spoken. With delivery scheduled for August 2028, this is your chance to invest in a property that offers outstanding value, strong market appreciation of 8% year-on-year, and excellent rental income potential at €800 per week. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE brings decades of expertise in creating exceptional living spaces that blend luxury, comfort, and smart investment potential.

locationSection.intro: Campo de San Juan in Moratalla, Murcia, is a rapidly emerging residential destination that perfectly balances rural charm with modern convenience. This strategic location offers discerning buyers 40% lower property values compared to Spanish island markets, making it an exceptional investment hotspot. The area is characterized by its welcoming international community, where English is commonly spoken, providing seamless integration for expatriates and foreign investors. Moratalla itself is renowned for its rich cultural heritage, stunning natural landscapes, and increasingly sophisticated infrastructure. The region benefits from excellent road connectivity, making it easy to access major cities while maintaining the peaceful lifestyle that attracts property buyers from across Europe. With established supermarkets like Mercadona and Lidl, quality healthcare facilities, and multiple recreational options, Campo de San Juan offers the complete package for modern living in Spain.
highlights: Airport: 30 minutes to Alicante International Airport (ALC)
Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses nearby, including prestigious regional courses
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics with English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets plus local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options from traditional Spanish cuisine to international restaurants

propertyFeatures.intro: ATAMARIA PARADISE villas are constructed to the highest Spanish building standards, featuring premium materials and meticulous attention to detail throughout. Each property combines modern aesthetics with practical functionality, designed specifically for the discerning buyer seeking both style and durability. The construction incorporates energy-efficient technologies including double glazing with thermal breaks and pre-installed air conditioning systems, ensuring comfortable living year-round while minimizing utility costs. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE has implemented quality control measures at every stage of construction, resulting in homes that deliver exceptional value and longevity.
features: Private swimming pool with premium finishes
Air conditioning pre-installation for complete comfort
Fitted kitchen with quality appliances included
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency
Private parking space with secure entry
Quality ceramic flooring throughout living areas
Modern bathroom fixtures with premium fittings
Video entry system for enhanced security

content.investmentSection: ATAMARIA PARADISE represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic emerging markets. Moratalla has demonstrated consistent property value growth of 8% year-on-year, substantially outpacing many traditional coastal markets. At €2,200 per square meter, properties in this development are priced 40% below comparable offerings in Spanish island destinations, providing exceptional value entry points. The rental market is equally attractive, with 7-night rental yields averaging €800, making ATAMARIA PARADISE ideal for investors seeking both appreciation and income generation. The established international community and English-speaking population create strong demand for both long-term rentals and holiday lettings. As infrastructure continues to develop and awareness of the region grows, early investors in ATAMARIA PARADISE are positioned to benefit from significant capital appreciation while enjoying immediate rental income potential.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in ATAMARIA PARADISE?
faqs.answer: ATAMARIA PARADISE villas start from €289,000 for 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom properties with 108m² built area on 750m² plots. This represents exceptional value in the Spanish property market. Contact us for current availability and pricing options.

faqs.question: When will ATAMARIA PARADISE be completed?
faqs.answer: Delivery is scheduled for 01-08-2028. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We can provide detailed delivery schedules and payment plans upon request.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of ATAMARIA PARADISE?
faqs.answer: PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE is the developer, bringing established expertise and reputation in creating quality residential developments in Moratalla and the wider Murcia region. They maintain rigorous construction standards and excellent customer satisfaction records.

faqs.question: Is Moratalla a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Moratalla is an excellent investment destination. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, property values increasing at 8% year-on-year, and exceptional amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes. It offers authentic Spanish living at significant value advantages.

faqs.question: How far is ATAMARIA PARADISE from the beach?
faqs.answer: ATAMARIA PARADISE is just 20 minutes from multiple Blue Flag beaches, offering easy weekend access while maintaining peaceful inland living. The location provides the perfect balance between coastal recreation and rural tranquility.

faqs.question: What amenities are near ATAMARIA PARADISE?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include major supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors, several championship golf courses, international schools with British curriculum options, and diverse restaurants. The established expat community ensures excellent local services.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without special restrictions. EU and non-EU citizens have the same property rights. We recommend obtaining legal advice to navigate the purchase process, including NIE number registration and tax obligations.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, typical costs include transfer tax (3-11% depending on region), notary and registration fees (1-2%), and legal fees (0.5-1%). For Murcia properties like ATAMARIA PARADISE, these represent competitive expenses. Consult your legal advisor for precise calculations.

content.conclusion: ATAMARIA PARADISE offers an exceptional opportunity to secure a modern, high-quality villa in a booming Spanish market at unbeatable value. Developed by the trusted PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, these 3-bedroom homes combine contemporary luxury with smart investment potential. With 8% annual appreciation, strong rental yields, and delivery in 2028, this is the ideal moment to invest. The welcoming international community, pristine beaches just 20 minutes away, and comprehensive amenities create the perfect lifestyle setting. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of paradise in Moratalla. Contact us via WhatsApp today for exclusive details, floor plans, and investment packages. Our expert team is ready to guide you through every step of your property journey.
